List of Plugins for XP.title: List of Plugins for XP
List of Plugins for XP.text:
<$button actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-plugincard}} tooltip="Create a plugincard" aria-label="new plugincard" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new plugincard  (<$count filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[Plugin Card]!has[draft.of]]'/> tiddlers)
<>

PLUGINS.title: PLUGINS
PLUGINS.caption: {{$:/xp/images/plugin}} PLUGINS
PLUGINS.text: 此处罗列插件相关信息。 * 实时查看当前含有的插件：[[Currently Installed Plugins]]（[[插件维护列表]]）； * 服务器版默认安装的插件：见配置文件 [[xp-tiddlywiki.info]]； * 查找更新：优先使用在线插件库 <> 查看更新。其他插件需访问原站点查看是否有更新； * 相关问题：[[如何下载 TiddlyWiki XP 中的所有插件？]] / [[如何寻找其他 TiddlyWiki 插件？]] <>

Change List.title: Change List
Change List.text:
!! 插件更改 / 适配

为确保更新插件时修改过的内容不会被覆盖掉，对修改的条目进行封装。插件条目封装至 $:/xp/PluginConfiguration；系统条目封装至 $:/xp/modify-default-tiddlers。

<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[Change List]sort[title]limit[1]]">
  <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[Change List]sort[]]" default={{!!title}} class="tc-vertical" />
</$list>

changelist-CodeMirror.title: changelist-CodeMirror
changelist-CodeMirror.caption: CodeMirror
changelist-CodeMirror.text:
\define tv-config-toolbar-text() yes
\define openCpCodeMirror()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab-1749438307" $value="$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab--697582678" $value="$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/CodeMirror"/>
<$action-navigate $to="$:/ControlPanel"/>
\end


!! $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror

!! 修改设置

在 <$button actions=<<openCpCodeMirror>>>{{$:/core/images/options-button}} ~CodeMirror</$button> 中，勾选 ''Enable line numbers''、''Highlight active line''。

修改文件为：

* $:/config/codemirror/lineNumbers
* $:/config/codemirror/styleActiveLine

changelist-Favorites.title: changelist-Favorites
changelist-Favorites.caption: Favorites
changelist-Favorites.text:
!! $:/plugins/kookma/favorites

由于侧边栏固定的项目较多，将文字标题换为图标显示：

* $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/sidebar-tab

changelist-FontAwesome.title: changelist-FontAwesome
changelist-FontAwesome.caption: FontAwesome
changelist-FontAwesome.text:
\define tv-config-toolbar-text() yes
\define openCpFontAwesome()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab-1749438307" $value="$:/plugins/TheDiveO/FontAwesome/ui/ControlPanel/FontAwesome"/>
<$action-navigate $to="$:/ControlPanel"/>
\end


!! $:/plugins/TheDiveO/FontAwesome

!! 修改设置

在 <$button actions=<<openCpFontAwesome>>>{{$:/core/images/options-button}} ~FontAwesome</$button> 中，取消勾选 ''decorate system links''、''decorate external links''。

修改文件为：

* $:/config/fa5/decorate-extlinks
* $:/config/fa5/decorate-syslinks

changelist-FontScroller.title: changelist-FontScroller
changelist-FontScroller.caption: Font Scroller
changelist-FontScroller.text:
!! $:/jd/Buttons/font-size

将按钮打包到 $:/xp/quickbar 里面：

* $:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/big-font
* $:/xp/quickbar/images/minus
* $:/xp/quickbar/images/plus

修改内容为：

* 按钮上显示字体大小
* 最小字体设置为 13px
* 为提高中文阅读体验，调整行高 bodylineheight > 1.46
* 适配 Stories 插件

changelist-Projectify.caption: Projectify

将主面板固定到侧边栏：

* [[Projectify|$:/xp/ui/SideBar/Projectify]]


将下面两项移出侧边栏：

* $:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/sidebar/Projects
* $:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/sidebar/Upcoming

【查看工具栏】删除按钮中的 list-before 排序（用 <<tag $:/tags/ViewToolbar>> 中的 list 字段进行排序）：

* $:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/buttons/ToggleTodo

changelist-Stories.title: changelist-Stories
changelist-Stories.caption: Stories
changelist-Stories.text:
!! $:/plugins/sq/Stories (Modified) 修改「hide right column」按钮： * $:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryToggleMenu 修改页面工具栏按钮： * $:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryTogglePageControl 修改查看工具栏/编辑工具栏按钮，仅在 PC 上显示按钮（手机上自动隐藏）： * $:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerMacro * $:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerEditMacro 修改图标： * $:/_sq/Stories/icons/bars.svg * $:/_sq/Stories/icons/bars-empty.svg
```svg ```
修改下划线样式： * $:/core/ui/SideBar/Open
```html
```
修改 Stories.css： * $:/_sq/Stories/Stories.css
修改滚动条的宽度： ```css .sq-story-rivertwo-scrollable::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 7px; } ``` 取消对侧边栏的变动： ```css /** .tc-sidebar-scrollable { width: calc({{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth}} - 14px); padding-left: 28px; } **/ ```
修改设置中 openLinkDivert 的默认值为 bottom： * $:/plugins/sq/Stories/settings
```json <$select tiddler=\"$:/_sq/Stories/config/openLinkDivert\" default=\"bottom\"> ```
禁用首次导入插件时在第二栏显示的提示： * 删除 $:/_sq/Stories/Story2StoryList 的 list 字段。 【查看工具栏】添加说明，使隐藏按钮时显示说明文字： * $:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerMacro
```css {{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/divert-right.svg}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="divert"/> {{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/divert-left.svg}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="divert"/> ```

Stories 与 commandpalette 不兼容的解决办法.title: Stories 与 commandpalette 不兼容的解决办法
Stories 与 commandpalette 不兼容的解决办法.text:
''问题描述：''同时存在两个插件时，commandpalette 没有将条目在主栏中打开，反而是在右栏中打开。

''解决办法：''通过新建一个条目 `$:/xp/ui/PageTemplate/fix-commandpalette`。这是个治标不治本的方法。如果该条目在故事河中打开后又被关闭，将导致 <kbd>ctrl-P</kbd> 无法唤醒 commandpalette，需要重新刷新维基。

dynannotate 与 appear 不兼容的解决办法.title: dynannotate 与 appear 不兼容的解决办法
dynannotate 与 appear 不兼容的解决办法.text: ''问题描述：''同时使用两个插件，将导致错误弹窗。 !! Internal JavaScript Error Well, this is embarrassing. It is recommended that you restart TiddlyWiki by refreshing your browser Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'offsetLeft' of null ''解决办法：''不知道怎么解决。但好在一般不启用 Dynannotate 插件。

other-instructions.title: other-instructions
other-instructions.caption: Other Instructions
other-instructions.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/ControlPanel/

!! XP 系插件

* 版本号跟随当前的 TiddlyWiki 版本，最后一位为更新次数。参见 [[插件维护列表]]。
* 插件间可能有联动，有资源共享。比如，一个插件使用另一个插件中的图片。所以一个插件脱离 XP 后，可能出现异常。


!! 模板条目

统一命名格式：`用途（-备注）.tmpl`，全部小写。比如：`popup.tmpl`

当前模板条目有：

<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]suffix[.tmpl]sort[title]limit[1]]">
  <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[tiddlers+shadows]suffix[.tmpl]sort[]]" default={{!!title}} class="tc-vertical"/>
</$list>


!! 搁置条目

弃置不用的条目。原本是要删除的，但是保险起见，先备份起来。

toc buttons:

* $:/_xp/Stylesheet/toc-buttons
* $:/xp/ui/SideBarSegments/toc-buttons

CodeMirror Plugin.title: CodeMirror Plugin
CodeMirror Plugin.caption: CodeMirror
CodeMirror Plugin.text:
The CodeMirror plugin adds a sophisticated web-based editor to TiddlyWiki.

See [ext[https://tiddlywiki.com/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror|plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] for a demo.


* $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror
** $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-autocomplete
** $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-closebrackets
** $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-closetag
** $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-css
** $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-markdown
** $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-xml
** $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-search-replace
** ~~~CodeMirror Fullscreen~~

Command Palette by Souk21.caption: Command Palette
Command Palette by Souk21.text:
A command palette for TiddlyWiki. Demo: https://souk21.github.io/TW-commandpalette.

{{!!url}}

This is a prototype, don't use with your wiki

* $:/plugins/souk21/commandpalette

Context Search by Danielo Rodrigez.title: Context Search by Danielo Rodrigez
Context Search by Danielo Rodrigez.caption: Context Search

DetailsWidget by Thomas Elmiger.title: DetailsWidget by Thomas Elmiger
DetailsWidget by Thomas Elmiger.caption: Details
DetailsWidget by Thomas Elmiger.text:
Disclosure HTML element

{{!!url}}

Create HTML 5 `<details>` elements including a `<summary>` using this widget.

* $:/plugins/telmiger/details

Dynannotate Plugin.title: Dynannotate Plugin
Dynannotate Plugin.caption: Dynannotate
Dynannotate Plugin.text:
{{!!url}}

The ''Dynannotate'' plugin allows annotations on textual content to be created and displayed. It has three components:

* The dynannotate widget overlays clickable textual annotations, search highlights and search snippets on the content that it contains
* The selection tracker displays a popup that tracks the selection, and keeps track of the selected text. It also tracks a prefix and suffix that can be used to disambiguate the selected text within the container
* The `<$action-popup>` widget is used for some specialised popup switching in the demo

''Note that the TiddlyWiki core plugin __Dynaview__ is required for correct operation of __Dynannotate__''


* $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/dynannotate
* $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/dynaview

Edit-CompText by AlainD.title: Edit-CompText by AlainD
Edit-CompText by AlainD.caption: Edit-CompText
Edit-CompText by AlainD.text: {{!!url}} This plugin adds ''completion'' when editing the body of a tiddler. * Enter completion-mode by typing `[[` or `CTRL+SPACE` * A list of tiddlers with a title that matches the pattern between `[[` and cursor appears * `UP/DOWN` keys can select a tiddler, `ENTER` to validate * `NEW` : can click with mouse or touch surface to select your completion. * If there is only one match, `ENTER` selects it. * you can specify you own trigger pattern and the list of possible completions. See [[$:/plugins/snowgoon88/edit-comptext/usage]] for more details. * `NEW` : after completion, the cursor can be set inside the inserted text. This allows for easier creation of "aliased links" (try completion with `||` for example). * `NEW` : version 0.9.1 and higher, the default TW5 editor automatically has autocompletion as soon as the plugin is enabled (if TW5 version 5.1.22 or higher) 与 ~CodeMirror 互斥，不推荐安装。请用默认快捷键 ctrl-L 创建维基文字链接 * $:/plugins/snowgoon88/edit-comptext

EditButtons by Thomas Elmiger.title: EditButtons by Thomas Elmiger
EditButtons by Thomas Elmiger.caption: EditButtons
EditButtons by Thomas Elmiger.text:
{{!!url}}

The [[EditButtons|$:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons]] plugin makes editing more efficient by adding three buttons to the edit toolbar: 

* <<.icon $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/cancel-close-button>> Cancel & Close (Discard & Close)
* <<.icon $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-close-button>> Save & Close (Done & Close)
* <<.icon $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons/images/done-open-button>> Save & Keep Open (Done & Reopen)

Inspired by Josiah and Richard William Smith. See Discussion in the [[Google Group|https://groups.google.com/d/msg/tiddlywiki/A4v-DqjN_D8/4hkOaaf0BQAJ]].

<div />

* $:/plugins/telmiger/EditButtons

Editor AutoLists by Saq Imtiaz.title: Editor AutoLists by Saq Imtiaz
Editor AutoLists by Saq Imtiaz.caption: Editor AutoLists
Editor AutoLists by Saq Imtiaz.text: {{!!url}} editor extension to automatically continue lists * $:/plugins/sq/editor-autolist 注意：[[Editor AutoLists|Editor AutoLists by Saq Imtiaz]] 与 [[CodeMirror|CodeMirror Plugin]] 的自动对齐功能相冲突。

EditorCounter by Thomas Elmiger.title: EditorCounter by Thomas Elmiger
EditorCounter by Thomas Elmiger.caption: EditorCounter
EditorCounter by Thomas Elmiger.text:
{{!!url}}

The [[EditorCounter plugin|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html#EditorCounter]] can display counters for words and characters in the edit view. In single page wikis it can save texts automagically in the background – check the [[plugin settings|$:/plugins/telmiger/EditorCounter/settings]].

<div />

* $:/plugins/telmiger/EditorCounter

EditorMagic by Mat von TWaddle.title: EditorMagic by Mat von TWaddle
EditorMagic by Mat von TWaddle.caption: EditorMagic
EditorMagic by Mat von TWaddle.text:
{{!!url}}

This is a proof of concept for autocomplete when using the editor. Clever stuff.

Favorites by Mohammad.title: Favorites by Mohammad
Favorites by Mohammad.caption: Favorites
Favorites by Mohammad.text:
Favorites plugin is a set of tool for creating favorites (bookmarks) in Tiddlywiki. Each favorite item is a shortcut to a tiddler.

{{!!url}}

A favorite item also called a bookmark is a shortcut, you are creating for quick access to it. You can access that bookmark at any time and view that as many times as you want without having to search and find it again.

The Favorites plugin contains three modes

* flat mode: one favorite list, no folder
* structured mode: use folder, search tool, export and delete tool
* frozen list: read only, simple table of content style


<div />

* $:/plugins/kookma/favorites

Font Scroller by jd.title: Font Scroller by jd
Font Scroller by jd.caption: Font Scroller
Font Scroller by jd.text:
{{!!url}}

A font scroller that will easily cycle through body font sizes.

* $:/jd/Buttons/font-size

See [[Change List|changelist-FontScroller]].

FontAwesome by TheDiveO.title: FontAwesome by TheDiveO
FontAwesome by TheDiveO.caption: FontAwesome
FontAwesome by TheDiveO.text:
{{!!url}}

<<<
The FontAwesome plugin supports embedding  Font Awesome in  TiddlyWiki 5. There is no need to install this font into your operating system in order to use it with TiddlyWiki 5. The font is already embedded in this TiddlyWiki 5 customization plugin instead, so nothing else to install.
<<<


* $:/plugins/TheDiveO/FontAwesome

Highlight Plugin.title: Highlight Plugin
Highlight Plugin.caption: Highlight
Highlight Plugin.text:
[ext[https://tiddlywiki.com/plugins/tiddlywiki/highlight|plugins/tiddlywiki/highlight]]

The Highlight plugin provides the ability to apply syntax colouring to text.

* $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/highlight

Internals Plugin.title: Internals Plugin
Internals Plugin.caption: Internals
Internals Plugin.text:
This plugin adds features to help explore the internals of TiddlyWiki:

* New preview panes showing:
** the parse tree
** the widget tree
** the raw HTML output

The first two include a dropdown for choosing block vs. inline parsing mode.

* $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals

KaTeX Plugin.title: KaTeX Plugin
KaTeX Plugin.caption: KaTeX
KaTeX Plugin.text:
[ext[https://tiddlywiki.com/plugins/tiddlywiki/katex|plugins/tiddlywiki/katex]]

This plugin adds the ability to display mathematical notation written in ~LaTeX.

* $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/katex

Kookma Plugin Library by Mohammad.title: Kookma Plugin Library by Mohammad
Kookma Plugin Library by Mohammad.caption: Kookma Plugin Library
Kookma Plugin Library by Mohammad.text:
This library contains most useful plugins developed under the name [[Kookma|https://github.com/kookma]] for Tiddlywiki 5. {{!!url}} It has two parts The plugin library introduces a very simple mechanism like Tiddlywiki Official Plugin Library to let select among the published plugins and install any number of them you like. ''How to use (install)'' # Simply drag and drop [[$:/config/KookmaPluginLibrary]] to your wiki
# Open $:/ControlPanel in your wiki
# Goto Plugins tab
# Click on the ''Get more plugins'' button
# Under ''Kookma Plugin Library'' click Open plugin library
# In the list of plugins appeared, click install on those plugins you like to install in your wiki

Link to Tabs by Mario Pietsch.title: Link to Tabs by Mario Pietsch
Link to Tabs by Mario Pietsch.caption: Link to Tabs

MathJax Plugin by Martin Kantor.title: MathJax Plugin by Martin Kantor
MathJax Plugin by Martin Kantor.caption: MathJax
MathJax Plugin by Martin Kantor.text:
An experimental MathJax plugin for TiddlyWiki version 5. As Martin says, the implementation is a bit of a hack but may be useful until we have a better alternative.

{{!!url}}

<<<
Welcome. I have created plugin for TiddlyWiki 5 which allows you to use MathJax (math in TeX and MathML) inside TiddlyWiki 5. It's unofficial plugin and it doesn't follow general policy of TiddlyWiki as stand-alone solution but it works. So you can use it if you want.
<<<

Multi Column Tag Dropdown by Mario Piets.title: Multi Column Tag Dropdown by Mario Pietsch
Multi Column Tag Dropdown by Mario Piets.caption: Multi Column Tag Dropdown
Multi Column Tag Dropdown by Mario Piets.text:
{{!!url}}

This plugin changes most dropdown dialogs into multi column dialogs, with CSS only.

This plugin is handy, if you have eg: ''a lot of tags''


* $:/plugins/wikilabs/multicol-dropdown

Pinboard by Mohammad.title: Pinboard by Mohammad
Pinboard by Mohammad.caption: Pinboard
Pinboard by Mohammad.text:
{{!!url}}

This is a plugin to create a [[pinboard|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bulletin_board]]

* a pinboard contains some notices pinned on a board
* a notice is a tiddler tagged with `pin`
* a notice is removed from board if it is tagged with `done`


<div />

* $:/plugins/kookma/pinboard

Plantuml by Tobias Beer.title: Plantuml by Tobias Beer
Plantuml by Tobias Beer.caption: Plantuml

Plugins for XP.title: Plugins for XP
Plugins for XP.caption: Plugins for XP
Plugins for XP.text:
~TiddlyWiki XP 相关插件。

@@.list-tree
* $:/xp（主要文件）
** $:/themes/xp-j
** $:/themes/xp-k（主题）
** $:/xp/buttonOrder / $:/xp/buttonOrder-server（按钮显示顺序）
** $:/xp/modify-default-tiddlers
** $:/xp/Plugins（插件列表）
** $:/xp/PluginConfiguration（插件的配置文件）
@@

|$:/xp/columns          |「编辑器工具栏」按钮，用于将内容分栏显示。 |
|$:/xp/details-button   |「编辑器工具栏」按钮，用于输入 [[DetailsWidget|$:/plugins/telmiger/details]] 的代码。 |
|$:/xp/Diary            |在侧边栏显示一个日记列表。 |
|$:/xp/emoji-button     |「编辑器工具栏」按钮，可以从下拉菜单中复制 Emoji。 |
|$:/xp/html-button     |「编辑器工具栏」按钮，用于输入 HTML 代码。 |
|$:/xp/LeftOpenTab      |「页面工具栏」按钮，将开启列表移至左边。 |
|$:/xp/manageTags       |「页面工具栏」按钮，在浏览模式直接添加或删除条目的标签。 |
|$:/xp/magicSidebar     |当侧边栏处于隐藏状态时，将鼠标指针划到右侧热点区显示侧边栏。 |
|$:/xp/mark-button      |「编辑器工具栏」按钮，用于格式化文本的颜色或背景。即：标记文本 / 高亮文本。 |
|$:/xp/quickbar         |一个常驻底部的快捷工具栏。 |
|$:/xp/SplashScreen     |选择一个喜欢的启动画面，或者自行添加。 |
|$:/xp/switchlayout     |「页面工具栏」按钮，在「固定故事」和「固定侧边栏」之间快速切换。 |
|$:/xp/theme-changer    |「页面工具栏」按钮，快速切换主题。 |

Preview by Tobias Beer.title: Preview by Tobias Beer
Preview by Tobias Beer.caption: Preview
Preview by Tobias Beer.text:
{{!!url}}

Shows a tiddler preview when hovering internal links

* $:/plugins/tobibeer/preview
** $:/plugins/tobibeer/appear

Prism by Gera2ld.title: Prism by Gera2ld
Prism by Gera2ld.caption: Prism

Projectify by Nicolas Petton.title: Projectify by Nicolas Petton
Projectify by Nicolas Petton.caption: Projectify
Projectify by Nicolas Petton.text:
Project & todo management for TiddlyWiki.

{{!!url}}

Projectify is a TiddlyWiki plugin for managing projects & todo lists,
inspired by products like [[Todoist|https://todoist.com]] and [[Basecamp|https://basecamp.com]].

Projectify features:

* An inbox for collecting tasks and thoughts
* Projects to structure tasks together into separate todo-lists
* Support for scheduling tasks
* A dashboard to quickly view all projects, the inbox, or scheduled tasks


<div />

* $:/plugins/nico/projectify
** $:/plugins/nico/projectify-zh-Hans
** $:/plugins/nico/shields

Refnotes by Mohammad.title: Refnotes by Mohammad
Refnotes by Mohammad.caption: Refnotes
Refnotes by Mohammad.text:
Refnotes plugin is a set of macros and stylesheets for creating abbreviations, footnotes and citations. It also makes tables of footnotes, abbreviations (glossary) and references (bibliography table).

{{!!url}}

Refnotes contains codes and elements to

;Create and insert
:Abbreviation
:Footnote
:Reference

;Create tables of
:Abbreviations or glossary
:Footnotes and endnotes
:References (bibliography) using different output style 

* $:/plugins/kookma/refnotes

Relink by Flibbles.title: Relink by Flibbles
Relink by Flibbles.caption: Relink
Relink by Flibbles.text:
Flexibility when relinking renamed tiddlers

{{!!url}}

When renaming a tiddler, Relink can update the fields, filters, and widgets of all other tiddlers. However, it works through whitelisting.

It's already configured to update tiddler titles for all core widgets, filters, and fields, but the whitelists can be customized for each of this in the configuration panel.

* $:/plugins/flibbles/relink
** $:/plugins/flibbles/relink-markdown
** $:/plugins/flibbles/relink-titles

Shiraz by Mohammad.title: Shiraz by Mohammad
Shiraz by Mohammad.caption: Shiraz
Shiraz by Mohammad.text:
Shiraz plugin is a very small in size and framework to create stylish contents in Tiddlywiki. 

{{!!url}}

Shiraz plugin contains extended markups, macros, styles, and many customization to empty Tiddlywiki and can be used as a ''starter kit''. 

Some of Shiraz features are:

* Customized elements like, alerts, cards, panels, badges
* Dynamic tables
* Sortable tables
* Display on demand, slider, and details
* Images, basic image macros, slidein, and overlay images, polaroid and pretty images
* Table customization tools
* Sticky footer
* Multi columns tiddler
* Multi column story river
* List search
* Badge status
* Notebook style
* Test utilities
* Stylish buttons

Adding Shiraz plugin to any Tiddlywiki converts it to a full production tool. Shiraz uses modified CSS classes from [[Bootstrap|https://getbootstrap.com/]].

* $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz

Stories by Saq Imtiaz.title: Stories by Saq Imtiaz
Stories by Saq Imtiaz.caption: Stories
Stories by Saq Imtiaz.text:
# {{!!url}}
# https://saqimtiaz.github.io/sq-tw/stories.html#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Fsq%2FStories

Add a second column to a TiddlyWiki layout using the default layout

* $:/plugins/sq/Stories ,,@@color:Red;//modified//@@,,

Story Tabs by BJ.caption: Story Tabs

Tekan (Kanban that stays with you) by Ri.title: Tekan (Kanban that stays with you) by Riz
Tekan (Kanban that stays with you) by Ri.caption: Tekan
Tekan (Kanban that stays with you) by Ri.text:
A Kanban implementation for TiddlyWiki with a familiar look and feel (see the [[demo|https://ibnishak.github.io/Tesseract/projects/tekan/]]).

{{!!url}}

<<<
This is Tekan, a TW based kanban. The easiest way to know tekan is to use it. So let us begin, shall we?
<<<


* $:/plugins/tesseract/tekan ,,@@color:Red;//modified//@@,,

Tiddler Commander by Mohammad.title: Tiddler Commander by Mohammad
Tiddler Commander by Mohammad.caption: Tiddler Commander
Tiddler Commander by Mohammad.text:
Tiddler Commander plugin, in short ''Commander'' is a unique tool for batch operations on tiddlers.

{{!!url}}

Commander has many features including:

* Bulk tiddler creation/deletion
* Selective operation
* Combo search to filter and select tiddlers
* Title operation: add, remove prefixes and suffixes, also remove cahras form begining and end of title (on renaming tiddlers, [[relink|https://flibbles.github.io/tw5-relink/]] can be used to update title in other tiddlers)
* Tag operation: add, remove, replace
* Field operation: add, remove, rename, and set field value
* ~SnR, search and replace in all fields including text, tags, //title//, and common fields
* Inspect, to review and inspect tiddlers in one place, scroll among them and edit all fields (including common fields), tags, text (title is an exception!)
* Log, create logs of all operations
* Search, //save and load// any combination of filter search

<div />

* $:/plugins/kookma/commander

TiddlyMap by Felix Küppers.title: TiddlyMap by Felix Küppers
TiddlyMap by Felix Küppers.caption: TiddlyMap
TiddlyMap by Felix Küppers.text:
Map drawing and topic visualization for your wiki.

{{!!url}}

(demo [[here|http://tiddlymap.org/]]) 


* $:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap

** $:/plugins/felixhayashi/topstoryview

TiddlyWiki Toolmap by David Gifford.text:
A topical index of known plugins, tutorials, themes, and other helpful tools for ~TiddlyWiki.

Timer by Eric Shulman.text:
{{!!url}}

TiddlyTools Time & Info - Calendars, alarms, timers clocks for TiddlyWiki

* [[TiddlyTools/Time/Calendar]]

TimerActions by OokTech.title: TimerActions by OokTech
TimerActions by OokTech.caption: TimerActions
TimerActions by OokTech.text:
{{!!url}}

!! What does it do?

You create scripts made up of action widgets and then the plugin runs the
scripts at specific times.

Options include:

* Periodic (Run every n minutes/seconds/hours/days)
* Run once after some interval (run once after 10 minutes have passed)

You can open the `Manage Timers` tab in $:/plugins/OokTech/TimerActions to
start, stop or edit existing timers and the `New Timer` tab to create new
timers.

* $:/plugins/OokTech/TimerActions

Tinka by Andreas Hahn.title: Tinka by Andreas Hahn
Tinka by Andreas Hahn.caption: Tinka
Tinka by Andreas Hahn.text:
The Tinka plugin provides the ability to create and modify plugins in the browser, without requiring the use of Node.js.

See https://github.com/TinkaPlugin/Tinka for the GitHub repo.

{{!!url}}

<<<
This is a Control Panel extension that aims to simplify the plugin creation and editing process. After installing, you will find a new tab in your control panel that makes creating and modifying plugins a little bit easier.
<<<

* $:/plugins/ahahn/tinka

Todolist by Mohammad.title: Todolist by Mohammad
Todolist by Mohammad.caption: Todolist
Todolist by Mohammad.text:
Todolist is a small pure wikitext plugin, contain all  tools to work with todo list. 

{{!!url}}

With Todolist, easily organize and prioritize your tasks and projects so you’ll always know exactly what to work on next.

Todolist creates custom UI and lets you to add new items, set priority, done/undone items,  archive, delete. Using Todolist plugin it is possible to create several todo lists in one Tiddlywiki.


* $:/plugins/kookma/todolist

TonGerner Plugins.title: TonGerner Plugins
TonGerner Plugins.caption: TonGerner Plugins
TonGerner Plugins.text:

* $:/plugins/tg/note-button

未安装插件：

* $:/plugins/tg/iframe-button
* $:/plugins/tg/layout
* $:/plugins/tg/topleftmenu
* ~~Go to bottom in edit mode~~

Trashbin by Mohammad.title: Trashbin by Mohammad
Trashbin by Mohammad.caption: Trashbin
Trashbin by Mohammad.text:
The concept behind Trashbin plugin is to have a simple mechanism to move deleted tiddlers to Trashbin and be able to restore them later if required.

{{!!url}}

The trash (also known as the Recycle Bin in Microsoft Windows) is a temporary storage for tiddlers that have been deleted in a Tiddlywiki by the user, but not yet permanently erased.

Typically, a trash bin is presented as a special storage, allowing the user to browse deleted (removed) tiddlers, undelete those that were deleted by mistake, or delete them permanently (either one by one, or by the "Empty Trash" function).

* $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin

Utility by Mohammad.title: Utility by Mohammad
Utility by Mohammad.caption: Utility
Utility by Mohammad.text:
The utility plugin objective is to provide set of tools for developers and authors. 

{{!!url}}

These tools include simple transclusions, show raw contents of tiddlers, author tools, wikitext macros, show fields in view mode, etc.


* $:/plugins/kookma/utility

WikiLabs by PMario.title: WikiLabs by PMario
WikiLabs by PMario.caption: WikiLabs Plugin Library
WikiLabs by PMario.text: A collection of references for testing concepts around ~TiddlyWiki 5... {{!!url}} <<< This is PMario's playground with ramblings about ~TiddlyWiki and related stuff. It basically is a "jump off" page to various ~TiddlyWiki sites, that show editions, themes and plugins. <<< ''How to use (install)'' To use in other wikis, drag and drop this link to those wikis: [[Wikilabs Library (latest)|$:/config/wikilabs/PluginLibraryWL/latest]]

encryptTiddler by Danielo Rodrigez.title: encryptTiddler by Danielo Rodrigez
encryptTiddler by Danielo Rodrigez.caption: encryptTiddler
encryptTiddler by Danielo Rodrigez.text:
This plugin adds the ability to encrypt your tiddlers individually.

{{!!url}}

This have several advantages:

* You can specify a different password for each tiddler if you want.
* You don't have to encrypt your whole wiky.
* If you forget your password, you only lose a tiddler.
* It's possible to edit the tiddler content , tags and fields ''except the encrypt field'' after encryption. Decrypting your tiddler will restore it to its original state when you encrypted it. This way you can hide the encrypted tiddlers as a "different" thing.
* You can even encrypt images.
* You can have sensible data in a day to day wiky.
* I didn't try this, but theoretically you can apply double encryption by encrypting your wiki too.

<div />

* $:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler

flowchart-tw5 by gt6796c.title: flowchart-tw5 by gt6796c
flowchart-tw5 by gt6796c.caption: flowchart-tw5

不兼容插件列表.title: 不兼容插件列表
不兼容插件列表.caption: Incompatible List
不兼容插件列表.text:
两个插件互相不兼容：

|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/dynannotate |!@@color:Red;incompatible with@@ |$:/plugins/tobibeer/appear |[[解决办法|dynannotate 与 appear 不兼容的解决办法]] |
|$:/plugins/sq/Stories |!@@color:Red;incompatible with@@ |$:/plugins/souk21/commandpalette |[[解决办法|Stories 与 commandpalette 不兼容的解决办法]] |

如何下载 TiddlyWiki XP 中的所有插件？.title: 如何下载 TiddlyWiki XP 中的所有插件？
如何下载 TiddlyWiki XP 中的所有插件？.text:
''下载所有插件''：从 [[Gitee|https://gitee.com/keatonlao/tiddlywiki-xp]] / [[GitHub|https://github.com/keatonlao/tiddlywiki-xp]] 上将 tiddlywiki-xp 仓库克隆下来。

* 单文件版本所有插件 `plugins/PluginforSingleFileVersion.zip`
* 服务器版本自定义插件库（~MyPluginStore） `version/tiddlywiki-xp_Server.zip`

如何寻找其他 TiddlyWiki 插件？.title: 如何寻找其他 TiddlyWiki 插件？
如何寻找其他 TiddlyWiki 插件？.text:
除了[[官方插件库|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Plugins/AddPlugins]]，您还可以在这些地方寻找插件：

# 官方文档中的 [[Community Plugins|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/Community%2520Plugins.html]]；
# 在 [[Community Links Aggregator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/Community%2520Links%2520Aggregator.html]] 中搜索「关键词」；
# 在 [[TiddlyWiki Toolmap|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/%2522TiddlyWiki%2520Toolmap%2522%2520by%2520David%2520Gifford.html]] 中搜索「关键词」；
# 或者在代码托管平台进行搜索。比如 [[GitHub]]。
